nodes.text: Hrath Koo was a Human male member of the Meatlump gang who lived on Corellia during the Galactic Civil War.
Following the Battle of Yavin, Hrath Koo was a member of the technology-hating Meatlumps and was based in a a cave near the city of Tyrena.

Circa 1 ABY, Hrath Koo harassed the businesswoman Teilo Monnro, repeatedly coming into her shop and destroying whatever she was working on. After several of these incidents, Monnro tracked Koo to the Meatlump Cave. She luckily met spacers who were working as independent agents for the Corellian Security Force and were investigating a Meatlump attack on the starship captain Osto Grissom The spacers agreed to help her with her problem. Hrath Koo was attacked by an unidentified Dark Jedi and killed.

Hrath Koo appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Hrath Koo was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
